title: BRIEF-EbixCash Signs Agreement To Transfer The Business Travel Contracts Of Cox And Kings, To Its Mercury Corporate Travel Division
text:
BRIEF-EbixCash Signs Agreement To Transfer The Business Travel Contracts Of Cox And Kings, To Its Mercury Corporate Travel Division

Stock Markets 19 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 17:11)

© Reuters. BRIEF-EbixCash Signs Agreement To Transfer The Business Travel Contracts Of Cox And Kings, To Its Mercury Corporate Travel Division Sept 27 (Reuters) - Ebix Inc : * EBIXCASH SIGNS AGREEMENT TO TRANSFER THE BUSINESS TRAVEL CONTRACTS OF COX AND KINGS, TO ITS MERCURY CORPORATE TRAVEL DIVISION * EBIX INC - UNDER AGREEMENT SOME KEY CORE (NS: ) EMPLOYEES OF COX AND KINGS WILL ALSO BE TRANSFERRED TO EBIXCASH PAYROLL WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT * EBIX INC - TRANSFERRED CORPORATE CLIENTS OF COX AND KINGS WILL NOW BE SERVICED BY EBIXCASH'S MERCURY DIVISION * EBIX INC - AGREEMENT IS PART OF EBIXCASH'S EFFORTS TO DOUBLE REVENUE, FROM CORPORATE TRAVEL SECTOR BY END OF FINANCIAL YEAR

BRIEF-EbixCash Signs Agreement To Transfer The Business Travel Contracts Of Cox And Kings, To Its Mercury Corporate Travel Division
description: BRIEF-EbixCash Signs Agreement To Transfer The Business Travel Contracts Of Cox And Kings, To Its Mercury Corporate Travel Division
